result.eng: They [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.
result.ga: bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.orig: bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.html: bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.
result.ponchtml: ḃíoḋ raon fairsing áḃair faoi ċaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á noċtaḋ faoi aċan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.

result.eng: But from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
result.ga: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu
result.orig: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu
result.html: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontuBut from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
result.ponchtml: Ó am go ċéile áfaċ ḃíoḋ seoid ġrinn tuairimíoċta nó léirṁeas géarċúiseaċ le fáil iontuBut from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.

result.eng: But the blogs that are worth reading are few and far between.
result.ga: ach tá na blaganna gaeilge ar fiú iad a léamh tearc go maith
result.orig: ach tá na blaganna gaeilge ar fiú iad a léamh tearc go maith
result.html: ach tá na blaganna gaeilge ar fiú iad a léamh tearc go maithBut the blogs that are worth reading are few and far between.
result.ponchtml: aċ tá na blaganna gaeilge ar fiú iad a léaṁ tearc go maiṫBut the blogs that are worth reading are few and far between.

result.eng: Some writers got very little feedback on their blogs.
result.ga: is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blaganna
result.orig: is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blaganna
result.html: is beag aischothú a fuair scríbhneoirí áirithe ar a gcuid blagannaSome writers got very little feedback on their blogs.
result.ponchtml: is beag aisċoṫú a fuair scríḃneoirí áiriṫe ar a gcuid blagannaSome writers got very little feedback on their blogs.

result.eng: The biggest reason why Irish-language blogs have started declining is...
result.ga: an chúis is mó go bhfuil meath tagtha ar bhlaganna na gaeilge ná
result.orig: an chúis is mó go bhfuil meath tagtha ar bhlaganna na gaeilge ná
result.html: an chúis is mó go bhfuil meath tagtha ar bhlaganna na gaeilge náThe biggest reason why Irish-language blogs have started declining is...
result.ponchtml: an ċúis is mó go ḃfuil meaṫ tagṫa ar ḃlaganna na gaeilge náThe biggest reason why Irish-language blogs have started declining is...

result.eng: You wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
result.ga: ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne
result.orig: ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne
result.html: ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líneYou wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
result.ponchtml: ní ḃeifeá ag súil leis an doiṁneaċt ċéanna tuairimíoċta uaṫu is a ḃeaḋ ó ṗostálaċa níba ḟaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líneYou wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
